visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart. The chart should have a title 'Social Media Marketing has grown revenue by 27% in past 3 months'. The x-axis should display months from January to October. The y-axis should display revenue in thousands of dollars with a custom label format. There should be a plot line indicating the average monthly sales with a red color and a dashed style. An annotation should be added to mark the start of a good growth period. The data series should show revenue for each month, with custom colors for specific data points.

title.text: Social Media Marketing has grown revenue by 27% in past 3 months

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a column chart that visualizes the revenue growth in the past 3 months due to social media marketing efforts. The chart includes a title that highlights the 27% revenue growth. The x-axis is labeled with months from January to October, while the y-axis displays revenue in thousands of dollars with a custom label format. A red plot line is added to indicate the average monthly sales, styled with a long dash dot pattern and accompanied by a bold, red-colored label. An annotation is placed at a specific point to mark the start of a good growth period. The data series for revenue includes custom colors for specific data points, enhancing the visual distinction of key data points.
